text: Şumori mohho nazdi Alloh taolo [az] rūze, ki osmonho va zaminro ofaridaast, dar kitoʙi Alloh taolo [Lavhi mahfuz] duvozdah moh ast, ki [çangu dargirī dar] cahor moh az on harom ast [Zulqa'da, Zulhiçça, Muharram va Raçaʙ]. In ast oini ustuvor [va rohi haq]. Pas, dar in [cahor moh] ʙar xud sitam nakuned va hamagī ʙo muşrikon ʙiçanged, cunonki hamai onon ʙo şumo meçangand va ʙidoned, ki Allloh taolo hamrohi parhezgoron ast
